title: TCO IS GOING ON TOUR!
description:
FAM!!! We're hitting the road with a brand new show covering the TCO classic "Class Action Park"!!! The Patreon pre-sale is on right now! Tickets go on sale for everyone tomorrow! If you're on the Patreon, check your email, you have all the links and codes you need! If you're NOT on the Patreon and you want to get in on this presale, GO HERE TO JOIN PATREON RIGHT NOW AND YOU'LL GET INSTANT ACCESS!

HERE'S THE SCHEDULE:
CHICAGO: Tuesday, May 3rd
BOSTON: Friday, May 6
SEATTLE: Sunday, May 15
LOS ANGELES: Tuesday, May 17
COLUMBUS: September 2022 (As part of Obsessed Fest, the first ever Obsessed Network Family weekend! More details coming next week! Follow @ObsessedFest on Instagram!)

Tickets go on sale for everyone tomorrow (2/23/22) at noon!
itunes:author: Obsessed Network
dc:creator: Obsessed Network
